016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.api.DnsLookup;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.net.Sockets;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.TextNode;
025import org.xbill.DNS.Name;
026import org.xbill.DNS.TextParseException;
027
028import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
029import java.net.URI;
030import java.net.URISyntaxException;
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.Collections;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
035
036public class HostsConfigurationLookup
037        implements DnsLookup {
038    private final ObjectNode hosts;
039    private final DnsClientConfiguration dnsClientConfiguration;
040
041    public HostsConfigurationLookup(Configuration configuration) {
042        dnsClientConfiguration = new DnsClientConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("dns.client"));
043        hosts = dnsClientConfiguration.getHosts();
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public CompletableFuture<List<URI>> resolve(URI uri) {
048
049        String host = uri.getHost();
050        if (host == null) {
051            host = uri.getAuthority();
052        }
053        if (host != null) {
054            try {
055                Iterable<String> hostNames = getHostNames(host, uri.getScheme());
056                for (String hostName : hostNames) {
057                    JsonNode lookup = hosts.get(hostName);
058                    if (lookup instanceof TextNode) {
059                        URI newUri = toURI(lookup.textValue(), uri);
060                        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(List.of(newUri));
061                    } else if (lookup instanceof ArrayNode an) {
062                        List<URI> addresses = new ArrayList<>();
063                        for (JsonNode jsonNode : an) {
064                            URI newUri = toURI(jsonNode.textValue(), uri);
065                            addresses.add(newUri);
066                        }
067                        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(addresses);
068                    }
069                }
070            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
071                return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(e);
072            }
073        }
074        return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(Collections.emptyList());
075    }
076
077    private Iterable<String> getHostNames(String host, String scheme) {
078        if (host.contains(".") && !scheme.equals("srv"))
079        {
080            return List.of(host);
081        } else
082        {
083            List<String> hostNames = new ArrayList<>();
084            hostNames.add(host);
085            for (Name domainName : dnsClientConfiguration.getSearchDomains()) {
086                try {
087                    hostNames.add(Name.fromString(host, domainName).toString(true));
088                } catch (TextParseException e) {
089                    // Ignore
090                }
091            }
092            return hostNames;
093        }
094    }
095
096    private URI toURI(String jsonText, URI uri) throws URISyntaxException {
097        if (jsonText.contains("://"))
098        {
099            return URI.create(jsonText);
100        } else
101        {
102            InetSocketAddress inetSocketAddress = Sockets.getInetSocketAddress(jsonText, uri.getPort());
103            return new URI(uri.getScheme(), uri.getUserInfo(), inetSocketAddress.getAddress().getHostAddress(), inetSocketAddress.getPort(), uri.getPath(), uri.getQuery(), uri.getFragment());
104        }
105    }
106}
